nodes.text: Rise was a propaganda poster designed by Coba Dunivee for the Galactic Empire. It depicted a stormtrooper firing a blaster rifle in a direction, with the words "Rise" next to the stormtrooper while standing in front of the Imperial crest, as well as nine TIE silhouettes flying in formation. Below the stormtrooper were silhouettes of ten stormtroopers standing at attention, as well as the words "Enlist in the Galactic Empire."
